description: This is a NativeScript plugin wrapping the popular Fresco library for managing images on Android.

name: nativescript-fresco

scripts.build: npm i && tsc && npm run ngc
scripts.clean: cd ../demo-angular && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove nativescript-fresco && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-fresco && tns plugin add ../src
